## End of registration 

Thank you for registering for the **Immcantation Users Group Virtual Meeting 2020**. Your registration has been received. 

The meeting will be held on January 29th, 2020, from 12:00pm to 3:00pm (EST). You will receive a reminder email along with connection details for how to join the meeting one week before the event. If you submitted an abstract, you will receive an email notification of the decission by December 20th, 2019.

Further details can be found at [our website](http://kleinstein.bitbucket.io/IM). If you have any questions, please contact us at [immcantation-meeting@googlegroups.com](mailto:immcantation-meeting@googlegroups.com). 

Best,  
The Immcantation Team
